document.full_text: investors are putting their faith in japan's ability to recover from its major disasters, barely changing their equity exposure to the stricken country despite earthquake, tsunami and nuclear breakdown.
document.title: investors cautious but don't desert japan: reuters
lines_and_colors: investors are putting their faith in japan's ability to recover from its major disasters, barely changing their equity exposure to the stricken country despite earthquake, tsunami and nuclear breakdown.
